name: Dave
message:
Ok, are you sure that you have generated your maps key correctly [**https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/android/v1/mapkey?hl=sv-SE#getdebugfingerprint**].
While v1 of the API has been deprecated, i.e. it is not possible to obtain a new key for that level, it should still work. That said, you should probably consider getting a v2 key so that you have the latest features.
